verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* ye \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

Let \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H6437"\w* ye \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* molten \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* ye \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offering|strong="H8002"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* favourable,

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* offered, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* whatsoever \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w two|strong="H3808"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ally man \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* profane \w and|strong="H0398"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H3117"\w* impiety:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath defiled \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* among \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3615"\w* thou reapest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* corn \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cut down \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* face \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* very \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ears \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bunches \w and|strong="H3068"\w* grapes \w that|strong="H3068"\w* fall down \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* take. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H8266"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w deceive|strong="H3584"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* neighbour.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* calumniate thy neighbour, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H1242"\w* violence. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w wages|strong="H6468"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \w by|strong="H1242"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* abide \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* speak evil \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* stumblingblock \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* which \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w unjust|strong="H5766"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w unjustly|strong="H5766"\w*. \w Respect|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w person|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* honour \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thy neighbour \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* detractor \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* whisperer \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy neighbour. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* openly, lest thou \w incur|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5358"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* mindful \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* injury \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w citizens|strong="H1121"\w*. Thou shalt \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* thyself. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* ye \w my|strong="H8104"\w* laws. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* make thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* gender \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H5927"\w* other kind. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* different seeds. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wear|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w that|strong="H0929"\w* \w is|strong="H7704"\w* woven \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H3610"\w* sorts.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* carnally \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bondservant \w and|strong="H0376"\w* marriageable, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w price|strong="H6299"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w free|strong="H2666"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w both|strong="H4191"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* scourged, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w free|strong="H2666"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* trespass \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w comes|strong="H0935"\w* forth \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* unclean \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* sanctified, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H1974"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* thereof, gathering \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* thereof. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* divine \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* observe dreams.

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* cut \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w* roundwise: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* shave \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* cuttings \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* figures \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w marks|strong="H3793"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Make \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w common|strong="H0776"\w* strumpet, lest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* defiled, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* ye \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* reverence \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Go \w not|strong="H0408"\w* aside \w after|strong="H0413"\w* wizards, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* ask any thing \w of|strong="H0430"\w* soothsayers, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hoary \w head|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* honour \w the|strong="H6440"\w* person \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w aged|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* abide \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w do|strong="H3238"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* upbraid \w him|strong="H0853"\w*:
